snippet.title: Large-scale integrated optics using TriPleX waveguide technology: from UV to IR.
snippet.description:
1.

In: Photonics Packaging, Integration, and Interconnects IX. Proceedings of SPIE, 7221 . SPIE--The International Society for Optical Engineering, 72210R. ISBN 9780819474674 Item availability restricted.
